contest-event.event-date:
May 17, 1958 D Glasgow Charities Contest
Glasgow Charities Contest 0 Other
glasgow-charities-contest
None
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Queens Park, Cathcart Road, Glasgow
March contest - 1st Clydebank, 2nd Croy, 3rd Bo'ness and Carriden. Best section 2 band - Kinneil Colliery. Best section 3 band - Airdrie Old. Best section 4 band - Broxburn Catholic. Deportment - 1st Broxburn Catholic, 2nd Whitburn. 40th annual contest 14 bands competed.
Aug. 17, 2013, 11:48 a.m. April 14, 2014, 11:21 a.m.
1 Clydebank Burgh Band John Kirkwood
2 City of Edinburgh Band John Hoggans
3 Unison Kinneil Band John Kirkwood
4 Newmains R. S. Dow
Unknown Result Alloa Burgh Charles Telfer
